de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.message.exception

Class RuleException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.ComprehensibleException
          • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.message.exception.RuleException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RuleException
extends ComprehensibleException
    Exception signals that a rule was violated by a checked value.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuleException

        public RuleException(String message,
             boolean fatal,
             long errorCode,
             int errorCause,
             Object... reasons)
        Creates an exception with a specified message and optional reason varargs. The other values describe the exception for further handling.
        Parameters:
        message - the specified exception message
        fatal - true if the exception is fatal and message processing must be stopped
        errorCode - a defined code classifying the exception
        errorCause - a second qualifier to describe the exception in addition to the classification more precisely
        reasons - the optional reasons, which let to the exception

      • RuleException

        public RuleException(String message,
             Throwable exception,
             boolean fatal,
             long errorCode,
             int errorCause,
             Object... reasons)
        Creates an exception with a specified message and optional reason varargs based on an existing exception. The other values describe the exception for further handling.
        Parameters:
        message - the specified exception message
        fatal - true if the exception is fatal and message processing must be stopped
        errorCode - a defined code classifying the exception
        errorCause - a second qualifier to describe the exception in addition to the classification more precisely
        exception - the existing exception, which has to be encapsulated
        reasons - the optional reasons, which let to the exception

    • Method Detail

        Returns whether the exception is fatal and message processing should be stopped.
        Returns:
        true if the exception is fatal
